# pmets

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The pmets package is a collection of tools for scale development and psychometric analysis

## Installation

You can install the development version of pmets from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mncube/pmets")
```

## Load Package

```{r example}
library(pmets)
```
